alfredsnippet.snippet:
Journey from the Center of the Sun
Jack B. Zirker
(p204)

"Prominences really have no business residing in the corona.  They are a hundred times cooler than the corona (with temperatures below 10,000 K) and a hudred times denser.  This cool, dense mass appears to hang suspended in the tenuous corona and would certainly collapse if it were not supported somehow.  The best guess these days is that magnetic fields in the cavity form a kind of cradle in which the prominence mass lies."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Textbook Solar Theory Suggests Solar Prominences Should Not Even Exist
